statement.p: The diagram below shows a triangle inscribed in a rectangle. The rectangle has width \displaystyle{7.00} in and height \displaystyle{3.00} in. One side of the triangle is a long side of the rectangle. The other triangle sides have lengths \displaystyle{4.24} in and \displaystyle{5.00} in.
What is the area of the shaded, inscribed triangle? in²
What is the area of the rectangle? in²
What is the area of the unshaded parts of the rectangle? in²
